mapper.insert: insert into tb_recreate_order(order_id, customer_card_number, recreation_id, order_price, start_time, end_time, order_status, hand_in_time) values (#{orderId}, #{customer.customerCardNumber}, #{recreation.recreationId}, #{orderPrice}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{orderStatus}, #{handInTime})
mapper.select: select count(1) from tb_recreate_order where date(hand_in_time) = date(#{handInTime})
